title: Dream Car Fixers
overview: Sheldon Nichols and bodywork specialist Peter Harriott source, restore and upgrade classic cars.Life-long friends Sheldon Nichols and Peter Harriott have been working on classic cars since they were teenagers. Together they use their combined 80 years of experience in the motor trade, to find and repair classic cars to their client's brief and budget.Mechanic Sheldon does the deals and sorts the oily bits while bodywork expert Peter makes sure the cars look as good as they should.The pair add desirable modernisations and bring the bodywork up to scratch, delivering the client their dream classic - with hopefully enough budget left over to make a small profit on the job!
